sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { LayoutService } from 'src/app/layout/service/app.layout.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styles: [` :host ::ng-deep .pi-eye, :host ::ng-deep .pi-eye-slash { transform:scale(1.6); margin-right: 1rem; color: var(--primary-color) !important; } `] }) export class LoginComponent { valCheck: string[] = ['remember']; password!: string; constructor(public layoutService: LayoutService) { } }
Bem-Vindo!
Faça login para continuar
Esqueceu a senha?
